node.title: Json Encoder
node.excerpt: Encodes your json files into utf-16.

node.title: ItemsWithEffectsPreset
node.excerpt: adds presets for items that give off Mob Effects.

node.title: Connectable Block
node.excerpt: Easily make your block connect with neighboring blocks by using part_visibity or geometries.

node.title: Navigator
node.excerpt: Adds a navigator component which can make entities walk on fixed paths, or generally walk to targetted blocks.

node.title: Violet Magic
node.excerpt: Adds a nice looking theme to bridge (dark mode only)

node.title: Item Equipped Sensor
node.excerpt: Adds a custom item component to allow you to simply run events and commands when the item is equipped/unequipped.

node.title: Firework
node.excerpt: Allows you to write complex logic by combining commands with molang!

node.title: Texture Set Generator
node.excerpt: Easily generate, customize and save .texture_set.json files
